key_modifications: Replaced 10 hardcoded navigation labels in mainNavItems array with i18n keys (nav.dashboard, nav.projects)
Replaced 8 hardcoded navigation labels in projectNavItems array with i18n keys (nav.equipment, nav.materials, etc.)
Replaced 2 hardcoded navigation labels in systemNavItems array with i18n keys (nav.auditLog, nav.settings)
Replaced hardcoded 'Construction Platform' with t('app.subtitle') call
Replaced hardcoded 'Current Project' with t('nav.currentProject') call
Wrapped all item.label references with t() function calls (4 occurrences)

patterns_discovered.details: Used hierarchical key naming pattern: 'nav.*' for navigation items, 'app.*' for application-level text
Navigation items defined as arrays of objects with label, path, and icon properties, enabling single point of i18n translation
All hardcoded strings wrapped with t() function at point of use (ListItemText primary prop) rather than modifying data structure

gotchas_discovered.description: All 20 navigation labels must have corresponding keys in i18n translation files using the exact 'nav.*' naming convention, or runtime errors will occur
camelCase convention used (nav.auditLog, nav.currentProject) - inconsistent naming would cause missing translations

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: No validation of i18n key existence
gotchas_discovered.description: Component doesn't validate that translation keys exist before rendering, relying on fallback behavior of i18n library

approach_outcome.description: Successfully replaced all 20 hardcoded navigation labels and 4 hardcoded application text strings with i18n t() calls
approach_outcome.functional_impact: Display text will now be translated based on user locale if translation files are properly configured

recommendations.recommendation: Verify all 20 navigation i18n keys (nav.dashboard, nav.projects, nav.equipment, etc.) exist in translation files before deployment
Test Sidebar component with different locales to ensure translations render correctly and layout accommodates variable text lengths
Document the i18n key naming convention for navigation (nav.*) and application text (app.*) to maintain consistency across codebase
Consider extracting navigation item definitions to separate i18n-aware configuration file for better maintainability
